nodes.name: What is the problem ?
nodes.title: # What is the problem ?
nodes.description:
# What is the problem ? 

 Do not rush in with solutions before taking time to define the problem being solved.

nodes.name: Who has the problem ?
nodes.description:
# Who has the problem ? 

Determine who is the client-that is, who must be made happy.

Establish some clues that may lead to appropriate solutions.
nodes.title: # Who has the problem?

nodes.name: How can you determine what is wrong?
nodes.description:
# How can you determine what is wrong? 

A problem is difference between things as desired and things as perceived.

Problem can be solved either by changing desires or changing perceptions.
nodes.title: # How can you determine what is wrong?

nodes.name: Solution ?
nodes.description:
# Solution ? 

Problem can be solved either by changing desires or changing perceptions.
nodes.title: # Solution

nodes.name: Three things that might be wrong with your solution
nodes.description:
# Three things that might be wrong with your solution 

Each solution is source of next next problem.

The Trickiest part of certain problems is just recognizing their existence.

If you can not think of at least three things that might be wrong with your understanding of problem. You don't understand the problem
nodes.title: # Three things
